actions: Invigorates the Blood, Disperses Cold and alleviates pain.
Strongly kills parasites, resolves toxicity, generates flesh and promotes the healing of sores.
Anchors rising Yang and move Qi downward.
Being poisonous, these herbs act as an antidote for noxious pathogens (kill cancer cells).

contraindications: These herbs are toxic. Use only as indicated.

notes: Calcine the ingredients and grind into a fine powder. Take 1.5-3g three times per day.
